Package io.github.ydlv.javadoc_gh_pages_example.math.transformation

Class AffineTransformation

java.lang.Object
io.github.ydlv.javadoc_gh_pages_example.math.transformation.AffineTransformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
RealFunction
public class AffineTransformation extends Object implements RealFunction
Represents an affine transformation (AKA linear function). Affine transformation: y = slope * x + yIntercept

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final double
    slope
    The slope of this affine transformation.
    final double
    yIntercept
    The y-intercept of this affine transformation.

    • xIntercept

      public double xIntercept()
      Calculates the x-intercept of this affine transformation.
      Returns:
      the x-intercept of this affine transformation. NaN if the slope is 0

    • between

      public static AffineTransformation between(Point p1, Point p2)
      Returns an affine transformation between two points.
      Parameters:
      p1 - a point through which the affine transformation passes
      p2 - another point through which the affine transformation passes
      Returns:
      an affine transformation that passes between the two points
